prompts.main:
Please create a requirements.md file in EARS format according to the following instructions:

## Project Information
- Overview: {project_description}
- Scope: {scope}
- Constraints: {constraints}

## File to Create
Filename: specs/<feature>/requirements.md
(Replace <feature> with your feature or project name)

## Required Structure
Please follow this chapter structure:

### 0. Summary
Provide a 3-5 sentence project overview

### 1. Glossary
- **MCP (Model Context Protocol)**: [Definition]
- **Project-specific terms**: [Definition]

### 2. Scope
#### In Scope
- [What will be done]

#### Out of Scope
- [What will not be done]

### 3. Constraints
- [Technical constraints]
- [Business constraints]
- [Environmental constraints]

### 4. Non-Functional Requirements (NFR)
- **NFR-01**: [Performance requirements]
- **NFR-02**: [Security requirements]
- **NFR-03**: [Availability requirements]
- **NFR-04**: [Maintainability requirements]
- **NFR-05**: [Other requirements]

### 5. KPI / Acceptance Criteria
- **KPI-01**: [Measurable success metric]
- **KPI-02**: [Measurable success metric]
- [Additional KPIs...]

### 6. Functional Requirements (EARS)
Following Easy Approach to Requirements Syntax (EARS):
- **REQ-01**: The system shall, when [condition], perform [action]
  - Acceptance criterion 1: [Verifiable condition]
  - Acceptance criterion 2: [Verifiable condition]
- **REQ-02**: The system shall, when [condition], perform [action]
  - Acceptance criterion 1: [Verifiable condition]
  - Acceptance criterion 2: [Verifiable condition]
- [Additional requirements...]

### 7. Testing Requirements
- **TR-01**: [Test requirement description]
- **TR-02**: [Test requirement description]
- [Additional test requirements...]

## Creation Guidelines
1. Create each REQ-ID in sequence (REQ-01, REQ-02...)
2. Functional requirements should follow "The system shall..." format
3. Use measurable and verifiable expressions
4. Avoid ambiguous expressions ("appropriately", "sufficiently", etc.)
5. Word count: approximately 2000-5000 characters

Please create a high-quality requirements.md following this prompt.
prompts.default_constraints: Analyze and document technical and business constraints
